name: Blasteroids! (brambasiel)
description:
Blasteroids is an 'Asteroids' clone programmed in Pygame Python.

How to play:

  • Aim mouse cursor to steer
  • Hold left mouse button to shoot
  • Hold space to thrust forwards

Please report any issues with the game! :)
